channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: Washington Post Journalist Thomas LeGro Arrested For Possessing Child Porn
item.description: The 48-year-old Washington Post reporter made his first appearance in the United States District Court on Friday in connection with the case.
item.content:encoded: The 48-year-old Washington Post reporter made his first appearance in the United States District Court on Friday in connection with the case.

item.title: Iran Extends Access To Airspace For Overflights After Ceasefire
item.description: Iran has expanded access to its airspace for international overflights following a ceasefire with Israel, though flight restrictions remain in place across much of the country.
item.content:encoded: Iran has expanded access to its airspace for international overflights following a ceasefire with Israel, though flight restrictions remain in place across much of the country.

item.title: 6-Year-Old British Boy Detained In Rs 18.8 Crore Drug Bust In Mauritius

media:content.media:description: The group was carrying more than 161kg of cannabis, (Representative pic)

item.description: A six-year-old British boy was detained in Mauritius after customs officials found 14 kilograms of cannabis hidden inside his suitcase.
item.content:encoded: A six-year-old British boy was detained in Mauritius after customs officials found 14 kilograms of cannabis hidden inside his suitcase.

item.title: Heavy Rain, Flash Floods In Pakistan Kill 32

media:content.media:description: Heavy rain and flash flooding across Pakistan have killed 32 people including 16 children

item.description: At least 13 people have also been killed in the eastern province of Punjab since Wednesday, the area's disaster management authority said.
item.content:encoded: At least 13 people have also been killed in the eastern province of Punjab since Wednesday, the area's disaster management authority said.

item.title: Europe Boils In Summer As Heatwave Warms The Continent

media:content.media:description: Southern Europeans braced Saturday for the first heatwave of the northern hemisphere summer

item.description: With residents of the southern French port city of Marseille expected to have to cope with temperatures flirting with 40C, authorities in city ordered public swimming pools to be made free of charge to help residents beat the Mediterranean heat.
item.content:encoded: With residents of the southern French port city of Marseille expected to have to cope with temperatures flirting with 40C, authorities in city ordered public swimming pools to be made free of charge to help residents beat the Mediterranean heat.

item.title: How Badar Khan Suri Parented His Children From Immigration Detention Centre

media:content.media:description: Badar Khan Suri explained how he helped manage his sons to get to terms with his absence

item.description: He has now returned to his regular parenting days, bringing his kids to the bus stop, and said that he has earned the privilege of being identified as the favourite parent in the household.
item.content:encoded: He has now returned to his regular parenting days, bringing his kids to the bus stop, and said that he has earned the privilege of being identified as the favourite parent in the household.

item.title: US Used 20% Of Its THAAD Missiles To Defend Israel For 12 Days: Report

media:content.media:description: The US used up a total of 15 to 20 per cent of the country's advanced anti-missile system

item.description: An estimate of 60-80 interceptors were utilised during the conflict. A single launch of a THAAD interceptor costs between $12-15 million, so the entire cost of these interceptors sits between $810 million to $1.215 billion.
item.content:encoded: An estimate of 60-80 interceptors were utilised during the conflict. A single launch of a THAAD interceptor costs between $12-15 million, so the entire cost of these interceptors sits between $810 million to $1.215 billion.

item.title: Elon Musk Says First Tesla Drove Itself From Factory to Customer

media:content.media:description: The vehicle reached a max speed of 72 miles per hour.

item.description: Elon Musk said a Tesla Model Y SUV drove itself from the company's factory near Austin to a customer's home in the company's latest move to showcase its push into autonomous driving.
item.content:encoded: Elon Musk said a Tesla Model Y SUV drove itself from the company's factory near Austin to a customer's home in the company's latest move to showcase its push into autonomous driving.

item.title: Why Republicans Want Donald Trump To Revoke Zohran Mamdani's US Citizenship

media:content.media:description: Republicans are calling for the deportation of New York City mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani

item.description: Indian-origin candidate Zohran Mamdani and a Democratic socialist emerged with a commanding lead in the Democratic mayoral primary, over former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo, who conceded late Tuesday.
item.content:encoded: Indian-origin candidate Zohran Mamdani and a Democratic socialist emerged with a commanding lead in the Democratic mayoral primary, over former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo, who conceded late Tuesday.

item.title: On Camera: 9 Swept Away In Flash Floods In Pak, Outing Turns Tragic For Family

media:content.media:description: In a spine-chilling video, a group of people are stranded on a few rocks surrounded by strong currents.

item.description: A picnic outing turned tragic for a family in Pakistan after nine out of 18 members of the group lost their lives in the Swat River flash floods. The incident occurred in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province on Friday.
item.content:encoded: <iframe title="Player" class="head-story__img img__full lazyload" height="300" scrolling=no frameborder=no src="about:blank" data-src="https://www.ndtv.com/video/embed-player/id/958665/play-via-app-wap?pWidth=100&pHeight=100&embed_type=story&site=classic&autostart=1"> </iframe>A picnic outing turned tragic for a family in Pakistan after nine out of 18 members of the group lost their lives in the Swat River flash floods. The incident occurred in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province on Friday.

item.title: Lauren Sanchez Wipes Instagram Posts, Changes Name After Marrying Jeff Bezos

media:content.media:description: The former journalist also changed her last name.

item.description: Hours after exchanging vows with Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sanchez wiped away all her old Instagram posts, leaving only two shares containing pictures from their wedding.
item.content:encoded: Hours after exchanging vows with Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sanchez wiped away all her old Instagram posts, leaving only two shares containing pictures from their wedding.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Isn't New York Mayor Yet But Already Faces MAGA's Heat

media:content.media:description: Zohran Mamdani won the Democratic primary for New York's mayoral polls.

item.description: Ever since Zohran Mamdani clinched a surprising victory in the Democratic primary for New York's mayoral polls, he has found himself in the crosshairs of Make America Great Again (MAGA) supporters.
item.content:encoded: Ever since Zohran Mamdani clinched a surprising victory in the Democratic primary for New York's mayoral polls, he has found himself in the crosshairs of Make America Great Again (MAGA) supporters.

item.title: Viral Dubai Chocolate Pulled From Shelves Over Undeclared Allergens

media:content.media:description: Shoppers will be able to return the recalled Dubai chocolate. (Food Standards/Australia)

item.description: A viral Dubai chocolate has been urgently recalled in Australia for failing to declare several allergens on its packaging properly.
item.content:encoded: A viral Dubai chocolate has been urgently recalled in Australia for failing to declare several allergens on its packaging properly.

item.title: 13 Soldiers Killed In Suicide Car Bomb Attack In Pakistan
item.description: A suicide attack claimed by the Pakistani Taliban killed 13 soldiers and wounded 29 people, including civilians, local government officials and police officers told AFP.
item.content:encoded: A suicide attack claimed by the Pakistani Taliban killed 13 soldiers and wounded 29 people, including civilians, local government officials and police officers told AFP.

item.title: "Dangerous Extremist Propaganda": How A Bald JD Vance Meme Got Tourist Banned From US

media:content.media:description: A Norwegian tourist was detained by the US Customs and Border Protection at Newark Airport

item.description: Mikkelsen said that the entire episode had been traumatic because of strip-searches, luggage ransacking, fingerprinting, blood sampling and falsified travel records. His Norwegian passport had also been mistakenly labelled as "Spanish".
item.content:encoded: Mikkelsen said that the entire episode had been traumatic because of strip-searches, luggage ransacking, fingerprinting, blood sampling and falsified travel records. His Norwegian passport had also been mistakenly labelled as "Spanish".

item.title: Warren Buffett Donates $6 Billion To Gates Foundation, 4 Family Charities

media:content.media:description: Warren Buffett still owns 13.8% of Berkshire's stock.

item.description: The donation of about 12.36 million Berkshire Class B shares boosted Buffett's overall giving to the charities to well over $60 billion.
item.content:encoded: The donation of about 12.36 million Berkshire Class B shares boosted Buffett's overall giving to the charities to well over $60 billion.

item.title: JD Vance's Wife Got To Know Of His Veep Nomination 5 Minutes Before Public
item.description: In July 2024, Donald Trump announced 39-year-old JD Vance as his running mate.
item.content:encoded: In July 2024, Donald Trump announced 39-year-old JD Vance as his running mate.

item.title: NDTV Exclusive: Pakistan Rebuilding Terror Launchpads Destroyed In Operation Sindoor

media:content.media:description: Posters featuring words like 'Martyrs of Bahawalpur' were set up in several areas.

item.description: Pakistan has begun rebuilding terrorist launchpads and training camps that were destroyed during India's precision military strikes under Operation Sindoor in May, sources have said.
item.content:encoded: Pakistan has begun rebuilding terrorist launchpads and training camps that were destroyed during India's precision military strikes under Operation Sindoor in May, sources have said.

item.title: Who is Thomas LeGro, Pulitzer-Winning Journalist Facing Child Porn Charges
item.description: Thomas Pham LeGro was working as a deputy video editor at the Washington Post.
item.content:encoded: Thomas Pham LeGro was working as a deputy video editor at the Washington Post.
